ai-tha-ap361:1.2_0: a monk and an excellent livelihood;
ai-tha-ap361:2.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap361:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap361:2.4_0: where there is a fruit and result.
ai-tha-ap361:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap361:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sarabha.
